Language.Text: Access an Alien Archive

The matriarch of St. Josephine Mission has asked you to go to an alien archive and subdue the AI that guards it.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

"Welcome, pilgrim! Your journey to Domina has only just begun, yet I fear that your road is blocked. The Iocrym, who no doubt serve Oracus, have blocked your path. They want to prevent you from meeting Domina."

"Yet faith in Domina will see you through. Many years ago, a convert to our cause dreamt of a repository of knowledge in the Heretic system. Her name was Sister Maryam Harawi and she dedicated her life to finding it.
"A few months ago, we found an alien archive in deep space. It must be the object of Sister Maryam's vision, and we believe that it contains knowledge that will help you to complete your journey to the Core."

"It is your destiny to seek this artifact of knowledge and gain access to the information that it contains.
"Do you accept the undertaking of this labor?"

"Excellent! We will tell you how to reach the alien archive, but once you get there you must subdue the AI that guards it.
"Take this ROM to help you to defeat the AI. After you connect your ship's computer to the archive, you must attempt to subdue the AI by inserting the proper level of virus code into its neural circuitry.
"Domina is with you! Good luck!"
"Your destiny will not change even if you choose to ignore it. Return here once you understand that."
"Your task is not yet complete. Go subdue the AI and retrieve the information from the alien archive."
"Your faith in Domina has been rewarded! Take the information that you obtained and give it to your friends from the Svalbard Explorer—they will be able to help you now."
"Domina tests our faith. Perhaps your failure to subdue the AI will prove to be a blessing in some way. Go with Domina, pilgrim!"
"Welcome, pilgrim! When your labors are done, return here and seek answers. Domina will show you the path forward."

Language.Text: [B]egin Neurohack
Do[n]e
[E]nter Chamber
You are docked at an alien installation—a cybernetic archive of some sort. An entrance before you leads to the primary chamber.
You are in the archive's primary chamber.
You connect your ship's computer to the archive and engage the neurohack ROM. The archive's AI accepts the connection, but you will have to subdue the AI before you can gain any information.
You are inside the archive's primary chamber. You attempt to connect your ship's computer, but all your efforts fail. It appears that the archive and the AI are permanently damaged.

You have subdued the AI! The AI speaks:
"What do you wish to know?"
The AI has no more answers. It shuts itself off.

The AI tells you one more thing:
"Although you were able to defeat my countermeasures to access my information, you did not disable my communications channel. Now the Iocrym know that you are trying to break the quarantine."
You have failed to subdue the AI.
Why have the Iocrym [q]uarantined us?
"Oracus threatens the Galaxy. The Iocrym are protecting the Galaxy from that threat. The first phase is to contain the threat at its point of origin. The second phase is to eliminate the threat."
What does [O]racus have to do with us?

"Oracus has been asleep for the last 30 million years. Now he wakens at the same time Humans begin their expansion into the Galaxy! The last war with Oracus began the same way and it nearly destroyed us."
What does '[e]liminate' mean?

"The quarantine bought us time to prepare, but it will not last forever. Oracus will see to that. The only solution is to sterilize the entire region. The Iocrym have already begun constructing stellar manipulators around the Gamma Crucis supergiant. When their work is complete they will induce a core collapse."
How do we stop the [G]amma Crucis explosion?
Language.String: "To reach Gamma Crucis you must break the quarantine."
Language.Text: How do we [b]reak the quarantine?
Language.String: "Disable the control point. This data ROM will help you."
Language.Text: Why is [D]omina calling me to the Core?
Language.String: "I do not know. But the idea to sterilize Human Space was hers."
Language.Text: What are our [c]hances of success?
"The threat to the Galaxy is severe. If Oracus succeeds, there is a 72% chance the Ancient Races will be extinct in the next million years."
"Alien structure"
